ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: ... a friend of mine (lvl 60 necro) started to do this, but there were some funny things happening, it looks like droga is very bugged currently: - he send
ygData.messageBody:
Nygaard, Jeff wrote:

> If I was just starting another character, I would definitely try to raise my
> Chardok faction. Chardok has several nice quests you can do once you get ~
> 50. To raise Chardok faction, you need to kill Goblins, the Goblins in
> Temple of Droga seem to give the best faction. There is a series of quests

> [...]

a friend of mine (lvl 60 necro) started to do this, but there were some
"funny" things happening, it looks like droga is very bugged currently:
- he send me a tell, i tried to "r", but game said he _is_ offline
- a "/w all" also said he isn't on
- he lost some "better" loot when he zoned out !!!


Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 52 magician
Tarew Marr
